messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: I use blogger.com -- It s totally free -- they give you a .blogspot.com address, and the blog design and posting options are really easy to manage/use.  Most
messages.messageBody:
I use blogger.com -- It's totally free -- they give you a .blogspot.com address, and the blog design and posting options are really easy to manage/use. Most of the other unschooling bloggers I know also use blogger.

Here's my blog if you want to see an example http://ourhapahome.blogspot.com

Sylvia

__________________________________________________

http://mail.yahoo.com

messages.subject: Re: question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Alison, I use blogger and yes, it s free. Start one...it s fun. :-) https://beta.blogger.com/start Joanne
messages.messageBody:
Hi Alison,

I use blogger and yes, it's free. Start one...it's fun. :-)
https://beta.blogger.com/start

Joanne

messages.subject: question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: I ve seen a lot mentioned about blogs lately. I have maintained a website for my kids pics before, but never a true blog. Are there places that offer free
messages.messageBody:
I've seen a lot mentioned about blogs lately. I have maintained a
website for my kids' pics before, but never a true blog. Are there
places that offer free space for blogs or do you use your internet
server's space?

alison
